p: The Fez-Meknes region includes nine prefectures and provinces: the prefecture of Fez, the prefecture of Meknes, the province of Boulemane, the province of Sefrou, the province of Moulay Yacoub, the province of Taounate, the province of Taza, the province of El Hajeb, and the province of Ifrane ( Table 1 and Figure 1).
